description: Application for non-material amendment of planning permission dated 21/12/2015, ref: PA/15/00630. To change:-Bin chute will be removed and a dedicated Student Bin Area provided at Lower Ground level.  General design development of plant spaces at basement level 01 carried out during Stage 3; Additional smoke vented lobby within communal corridor at level 02 (building control requirement)Lobby shown within amenity spaces on every third accommodation floor (building control requirement); Level 45 amenity floorplate subdivided to maintain maximum area of 100m2 for each space (fire regulation requirement). Proposed uses remain as per the approved plans; and PV panels shown on canopy at level 46M (as agreed with GLA pre-determination).
site_name: West India House, 30 Marsh Wall, London
